name: clase-3
description: - Install Node JS from [NodeJS download web page](https://nodejs.org/en/download) ### Libraries (Install not required) - Install EJS (Motor de plantillas) using **npm install ejs** - Install JWT using **npm install jsonwebtoken** - Install cookie-parser using **npm install cookie-parser** - Install bcrypt using **npm install bcrypt** - Install express using **npm install express --save** - Install MySQL2 using **npm install --save mysql2**
